Mecca.title: Mecca
Mecca.byline: Mecca, officially known as Makkah al-Mukarramah (Arabic: مكة المكرمة, Makkah al-Mukarramah), is a city in Saudi Arabia and the holiest city in Islam.

Mechelen.title: Mechelen
Mechelen.byline: Mechelen is a historically important city located on the river Dyle in the center of Flanders, one of the three regions in Belgium.

Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania.title: Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania
Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania.byline: Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania (Mecklenburg-Vorpommern) is a Land (state) in Germany, located in the northeastern corner of the country between Brandenburg, Schleswig-Holstein, Lower Saxony and the Baltic Sea, and the neighboring country of Poland.
